JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Housekeeper søges til hoteller i Holland og Belgien
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
We are looking for housekeepers for Netherlands/France/Austria. The clients are hotels and holiday parks.

You need to be an EU Citizens, as we cannot provide work Visa, candidates from outside EU will not be answered på Application. 

Position:

  1. Perform a variety of cleaning activities such as sweeping, mopping, dusting and polishing
  2. Ensure all rooms are cared for and inspected according to standards
  3. Protect equipment and make sure there are no inadequacies
  4. Notify superiors on any damages, deficits and disturbances
  5. Deal with reasonable complaints/requests with professionalism and patience
  6. Check stocking levels of all consumables and replace when appropriate
  7. Adhere strictly to rules regarding health and safety and be aware of any company-related practices

The candidates must:

  • Have experience in this position
  • Speak English, plus another Eu language is a bonus
  • Be in the age from 18-30 years old
  • Be representative, open, motivated

 

Salary is 10,50€/h +ET and holiday money, they can earn 1800 to 1900€ a month netto.

Accommodation in single room price between 150€-300€ a month.

 

If you are interested in this job, please reach out to our recruiter and we will help you with answering your questions, and set up a killer application.
